caption.p: Box plot of COVID-19 incidence and mortality rate above quantile of PM2.5. (A) Relationship between quartiles of PM2.5 and COVID-19 incidence rate × 100,000. (B) Relationship between quartiles of PM2.5 and COVID-19 mortality rate × 100,000. The quartiles of PM2.5 are 1: [2.06–7.46 µg/m3); 2: [7.46–14.12 µg/m3); 3: [14.12–22.60 µg/m3); 4: [22.60–65.43 µg/m3].
